name: Night Feeder
description:
WELCOME TO NIGHT FEEDER


Night Feeder is a bullet heaven where you embody the monstrosity of the darkness. Choose a deity to blees your run. Battle foes, upgrade your gear, and summon minions on a journey shaped by destiny.

Features


🎴 Items to upgrade
✅ Enemy variety
✅ Minions to summon
✅ Stages to complete
✅ Deities to bless your run
🎁 Plenty of achievements

Join our Discord server. Let us know what you think about the Night Feeder and please consider rating the game!
